description: This file contains implementation code for a component related to the BSP Run-time Execution Engine (BREE), defining functions for creating, initializing, and removing objects associated with 'BreeSpoReader' and 'BreeSpoReaderCO'. It includes object-oriented patterns in C, such as function pointers and object initialization, indicating it's part of a larger object-oriented C project.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BreeSpoReaderCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a BreeSpoReader object, setting up function pointers for object behavior.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BreeSpoReaderCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys a BreeSpoReader object, releasing resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BreeSpoReaderCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes a BreeSpoReader object, setting its method pointers and base class initialization.
